--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Well you know what they say, if you keep up that face, you
will 
be
> stuck with it :)


    OOC: LOL....yeppers! And did I ever listen to the warnings? 
NnnnnnnNNNNNNOOOOOooooooo. Just proves that hindsight is always 20/20.

**********************

> 
> BIC:
> 
> Beachcomber moved forward, cautiously. He was worried. "Are you all
> right?" He asked.


    ::Rehhot::
 
     Redhot heared words through his mental haze and it took a few 
momments to register their meanings.    
     His vocal sensor clicked, trying to form words.
     "H..h..help."
     He tilted his head up, exposing his red eyes. His gaze was 
unfocused and the effort of keeping his head in position made him 
tremble. When his endurance faded, his head hit the rocky ground with 
a sickening ** Klang! **.


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
*****************************
